settings.testimonial_text: "Repurpose is a place to do good by shopping sustainable and giving to charties that help women and families. It's such an honor to a part of the community"

settings.hero-menu-subheading: Link to any collection, product or page

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: We are a nonprofit organization that utilizes the resale of luxury items to raise funds and develop programs to support the health and wellbeing of women & families.

At Shop Repurpose we offer new and resale luxury goods to help customers look and feel their best. Our operations create workforce development opportunities to promote economic independence. And as a nonprofit, 100% of our net proceeds fund grants for organizations that support the health and wellbeing of individuals and families.

settings.title: Our Community
settings.text: Our Workforce Development Program supports the growth of employees by helping them reach their full potential and clear path to economic independence.

settings.title: Support Us
settings.text: Join us in our mission to invest in the growth and development of our employees. Help us build a more sustainable and equitable future.

settings.title: Clothing Donations
settings.text: Donate your high-end loved items. No need to leave the house, we will arrange a pick up and sell it in our vintage designer store in NYC! Be part of circular fashion revolution!

We bring together individuals, brands and organizations that want to empower women in need. Individuals and brands donate new and gently used luxury clothing for resale and a second life. Net proceeds fund grants to help those in need. In addition to grants, we also work with partners to support workforce development – mentoring, training and jobs to help individuals gain economic independence.

settings.title: We are proud to acknowledge the following foundations, brands, agencies & individuals.
